values.description: A massive snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a bear. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
A massive snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a bear. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
A massive snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a bear. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
A rounded, fuzzy ear, sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It looks rather cute.
A short tail, like that of a bear. Not much of a tail, really.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: huge paw
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Massive, clawed paws that belong on a bear rather than a human. They are deadly in a fight, but are rather useless at fine manipulation.

li.description: Each finger on this hand is tipped with a huge, sharp claw.
In addition to massive claws, this hand is growing larger and developing thick pads on the palm and each fingertip.
This hand is has grown noticably larger and is starting to look more like a paw than a hand.
This hand's fingers have started to shorten and the thumb is moving up to become a fifth clawed finger.

li.label: unfamiliar
li.description: A massive, five-toed paw with deadly claws has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand. [PAWN_pronoun] will be useless at fine manipulation until [PAWN_pronoun] adapts to them, but at least [PAWN_pronoun] can rip things apart with [PAWN_possessive] bear hands, err paws.

li.label: adapted
li.description: A massive, five-toed paw with deadly claws has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand. [PAWN_pronoun] has gotten used to having five fingers and no thumb, but the huge size still makes them more clumsy than someone with smaller paws. At least [PAWN_pronoun] can rip things apart with [PAWN_possessive] bear hands, err paws.

A massive, hand-like paw with deadly claws has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand. Further adaption has resulted in the thumb returning to its usual place, giving [PAWN_objective] better manipulation than your average bear. The size still makes it slightly more awkward to use than a regular hand, but at least [PAWN_pronoun] can rip things apart with [PAWN_possessive] bear hands.

A massive hand-like paw with deadly claws has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand. Even further adaption has given the handpaw remarkable dexterity for its size without making it any less deadly. [PAWN_pronoun] can easily swap from gently holding something to ripping it apart with [PAWN_possessive] bear hands.
